1: <sup>1</sup> This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;
2: <sup>2</sup> Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.
3: <sup>3</sup> And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, and after his image; and called his name Seth:
4: <sup>4</sup> And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:
5: <sup>5</sup> And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.
6: <sup>6</sup> And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:
7: <sup>7</sup> And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:
8: <sup>8</sup> And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.
9: <sup>9</sup> And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:
10: <sup>10</sup> And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:
11: <sup>11</sup> And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.
12: <sup>12</sup> And Cainan lived seventy years and begat Mahalaleel:
13: <sup>13</sup> And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:
14: <sup>14</sup> And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.
15: <sup>15</sup> And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:
16: <sup>16</sup> And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:
17: <sup>17</sup> And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.
18: <sup>18</sup> And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:
19: <sup>19</sup> And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
20: <sup>20</sup> And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.
21: <sup>21</sup> And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:
22: <sup>22</sup> And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
23: <sup>23</sup> And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:
24: <sup>24</sup> And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.
25: <sup>25</sup> And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech.
26: <sup>26</sup> And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:
27: <sup>27</sup> And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.
28: <sup>28</sup> And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:
29: <sup>29</sup> And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the LORD hath cursed.
30: <sup>30</sup> And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:
31: <sup>31</sup> And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.
32: <sup>32</sup> And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
